data.text:
The #EUJusticeScoreboard gives a comparative overview of the independence, quality and efficiency of justice systems in all EU countries. 
Read some of the key findings from the 2018 edition → https://t.co/KBcKq2iPoo https://t.co/bxZZHqxuQw

This week, we put forward our #EUBudget proposals on
🖇️ #CohesionPolicy
👫 #ErasmusPlus #SocialRights and #CreativeEurope 
💶 #DeepeningEMU 
🌱 Friday #FutureofCAP and #LIFEprogramme
In case you missed it, catch up with our moment → https://t.co/4rWZJzNsIO https://t.co/Xmh4bMtSpI

Single use plastics are not a smart economic or environmental choice.
This week, we proposed new EU-wide rules to target the 10 single-use plastic products most often found on Europe's beaches and seas. #PlasticsStrategy 
Learn more → https://t.co/Ra44CWEVXe https://t.co/Q1KqSkWezC

Today we celebrate Italy, side by side with the Italian people! 🇮🇹 
Italy has been part of our family from the start. Along with other five European nations, it was one of the creators of our common market and our customs union. 
Happy #FestaDellaRepubblica! #2giugno https://t.co/u5gWryFpLA

We believe that unilateral US restrictions on steel and aluminium are unjustified and at odds with World Trade Organisation rules. We will now trigger a dispute settlement case at the WTO. #EUtrade https://t.co/hoDuQhzPms

Taking action to protect pollinators in the EU! 🐝 

We collected over 66,000 views in our online survey and through a wide consultation process heard from experts via workshops, groups and committees. Thank you all for your feedback!
#EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/QyALgmYskn

"We will now trigger a dispute settlement case at the WTO, since the US measures 
on steel and aluminium clearly go against agreed international rules" @MalmstromEU #EUTrade https://t.co/P7xb6seTxj
We will be live with @MalmstromEU at 14:00 CET about the US tariffs on steel and aluminium. #EUtrade https://t.co/rGPL54lTKB

We are tackling the decline of pollinators with the first-ever EU initiative to address their decline. New measures include:
• new indicator to improve monitoring and data
• better coordination of EU action across different sectors & policies
https://t.co/GiweOueCq3 https://t.co/5OukWrEyX3

data.text:
We are a global leader for #ClimateAction.
For more information, see: 
  → #LIFEprogramme Press Release https://t.co/acBpi6eAjl 
  → Website https://t.co/bx369rNQzp
  → Factsheet https://t.co/bK4iqWl0N3
  → Follow @EU_ENV, @EUClimateAction and @LIFEprogramme https://t.co/LhbcxBMkAe
We have integrated climate action into all major EU spending programmes, making the #EUBudget a driver of sustainability. Proposals for the #LIFEprogramme with @KarmenuVella https://t.co/y9tRtKI35d

data.text:
The main features of the new #LIFEprogramme:
✅ clean energy
✅ nature and biodiversity
✅ circular economy and climate change mitigation
✅ simple and flexible
Learn more → https://t.co/acBpi6eAjl #EUBudget https://t.co/v42Bql9LjZ

Why modernise the Common Agricultural Policy?
For more information, see:  
→ #FutureofCAP Press Release https://t.co/GNlfDldWFp
→ Questions & Answers https://t.co/p7ZnVeAVIE
→ Factsheets https://t.co/bK4iqWl0N3
→ Follow @EUAgri https://t.co/dtQeZWG5w3

We are making sure that the Common Agricultural Policy remains a future-proof policy. Our #EUBudget proposals on the #FutureofCAP will contribute to the competitiveness of the agricultural sector, whilst at the same time reinforce its sustainability. https://t.co/WqatCFsTCp

The #FutureofCAP also means more research and innovation:  
🔬€10 billion from #HorizonEU programme to innovation in agriculture and bioeconomy
🔎 Use big data and new technologies for controls and monitoring
📲 Digitisation of rural life
Learn more → https://t.co/GNlfDldWFp https://t.co/6FyDplCtdD

We want better targeting of support:
✅Direct payments will remain essential
✅Priority will be given to small and medium-sized farms 
✅Fairer distribution of direct payments between EU countries
More → https://t.co/GNlfDldWFp #EUBudget #FutureofCAP https://t.co/5trUP7XmcW

The Common Agricultural Policy is one of our core policies. 
With our #EUBudget proposals on the #FutureofCAP, we provide more flexibility to EU countries to improve the effectiveness of the policy and better monitor its  results. 
Learn more → https://t.co/GNlfDldWFp https://t.co/Fg1ntJKSGT

#ParentsDay
Parents should have the right to suitable leave, flexible working arrangements and access to care services.
More on the 🇪🇺 Pillar of #SocialRights for a more inclusive and fairer Union → https://t.co/rGaMiOOYGU https://t.co/XtrtGeYumn

We are a global frontrunner in sustainability and #ClimateAction
Today, we will also present our #EUBudget proposals on #LIFEprogramme  Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/ExfxG4bP9K

Europe needs a resilient, sustainable and competitive agricultural sector to ensure production of high-quality, safe and affordable food. 
Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on #FutureofCAP. Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/GXKvgU2Uwx

data.text: “Today is a bad day for world trade. The EU cannot not react. We will immediately introduce a settlement dispute at WTO and will announce counterbalancing measures in the next hours. Unilateral measures are totally unacceptable." @JunckerEU #EUTrade https://t.co/p3sPMfyzCe
https://t.co/KrwDE8cz5d
https://t.co/thLSkO7yma
https://t.co/99W51H39oy

We react to the US restrictions on steel and aluminium affecting the EU. The EU believes these unilateral US tariffs are unjustified and at odds with World Trade Organisation rules. This is protectionism, pure and simple. → https://t.co/mOseAOSjZT
@RozsaNiki Hi @RozsaNiki, thanks for the positive feedback! We are working to make the European Citizens’ Initiative a tool Europeans are familiar with! Best, the Social Media Team

Our Economic and Monetary Union is about improving the lives of all Europeans.
For more information, see:
→ #DeepeningEMU Press Release https://t.co/MZPkWgYh8D
→ Questions & Answers https://t.co/nY5uewRr7R
→ Factsheets https://t.co/rcvBnZy8ie
→ Follow @ecfin
#EUBudget https://t.co/8t4vzNTPoo

Why are we proposing the European Investment Stabilisation Function?

This new instrument will help maintain public investment levels in the event of large asymmetric shocks—preserving stability and facilitating economic recovery.
https://t.co/nY5uewRr7R #EUBudget #DeepeningEMU https://t.co/7AEUsCo7WJ

The Reform Support Programme will be voluntary with:
• Reform Delivery Tool→ financial support to reforms
• Technical Support Instrument→ technical expertise
• Convergence Facility→ support for Member States wishing to join €
https://t.co/MZPkWgYh8D #EUBudget #deepeningEMU https://t.co/zkTyh86DND

We are putting the #EUBudget at work to boost the performance, resilience and response capacity of all Member States, whether already in the euro or preparing to join.
@VDombrovskis @pierremoscovici #DeepeningEMU https://t.co/x7yWB9w1iv

On World #NoTobacco Day, take the time to answer our survey on taxation of tobacco products. Your answers will help us revise the current legislation & ensure:
• high level of health protection
• functioning of internal market
The survey→ https://t.co/wPpOEg5pF3 #EUHaveYourSay

Together, we can achieve more! 👫
Take a look at the European Citizens’ Initiative Forum to see if you can find a like-minded partner to help you launch your initiative! 👉 https://t.co/rwD1cGCoah #EUTakeTheInitiative https://t.co/QCD68eer4r

Today is #WorldNoTobaccoDay. 
EU smoking rate has remained stagnant at 26% since 2014. Amongst people aged 15 to 24, the rate has increased from 25% in 2014 to 29% in 2017.
We need to reverse this trend.
Read our statement → https://t.co/kBoRCIkEOw #NoTobaccoDay https://t.co/tFUf74IxKe

A stable euro is the precondition for jobs, growth, investment and social fairness.
Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on #DeepeningEMU with two new instruments: the Reform Support Programme and the European Investment Stabilisation Function. Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/I0eD4GXhhs

Save the date!
On 15 June in Brussels we discuss the future of #BetterRegulation with @TimmermansEU, the Regulatory Scrutiny Board, and regulatory oversight professionals.
Be part of the debate: check out the programme and get in touch with us to join! https://t.co/pFL6LdHvJv https://t.co/kJlFtEcMf1

@Tearene Hi Irene, we try to offer our feedback to everyone whenever we can. 
Best, the social media team

@Dulcibella52 @TimmermansEU @EU_CoR Dear @Dulcibella52, the decision-making powers at EU level are with the Member States’ Governments, as well as with the European Parliament. The Task Force works to identify areas where EU action should focus and others where competencies can be re-delegated to Member States.

data.text: Providing new energy solutions, pioneering new ways to fish and face climate change – the EU-funded ocean research platform in the Canary Islands is helping secure our future. https://t.co/r5UmMgUWgL #investEU #EMD2018 https://t.co/dXxAktddOO

@gailvCrete .@gailvCrete, we do know what we are doing.
As the EU functioning is founded on representative democracy, we give citizens the possibility to contribute to decision-making, which is why we opened this online consultation. Input received will feed the work of the Task Force.

@corinne_podger Dear @corinne_podger, thank you for your suggestion.
Subsidiarity is one of the founding principles on which the EU is based, and it's set out in the EU treaties.
In other words it means that decisions are taken as closely as possible to the citizens.
Best, the social media team

@aq69804091 Dear @aq69804091, check out what the EU is already doing on each of those areas:
-Children rights: https://t.co/gMF0lpswiz
-Animal welfare: https://t.co/PJLzo4oLXq
-Gender equality: https://t.co/vkDjdRm5dV
-Health protection: https://t.co/HDPWIQQHfp
Best, the social media team

Providing new energy solutions, pioneering new ways to fish and face climate change – the EU-funded ocean research platform in the Canary Islands is helping secure our future https://t.co/r5UmMgUWgL 
#investEU #DiadeCanarias #EMD2018 https://t.co/Pk6g35OZgT

@LucianSarbu you can ask for your personal data to be transferred directly to another company whose services you would like to use, when it's technically feasible. You need to contact the company who has the data you want to transfer and ask them. https://t.co/39kGAz4MjB

For more information:
  → Read our #SocialRights press release https://t.co/IGNRtZDLlY
  → Read our #ErasmusPlus press release https://t.co/DEd0Q3FX2a
  → Read our #CreativeEurope press release https://t.co/uCnRoSbh3p
  → Follow @EU_Social, @EUErasmusPlus and @MEDIAprogEU https://t.co/JZaaiHDYcN

We want EU creators to make the most out of digital opportunities.
In our #EUBudget, we want our #CreativeEurope programme to focus more on:
🗂️ Cross-border projects
🎚️ Digital transformation
🌍 Promotion in the world
Learn more → https://t.co/uCnRoSbh3p #EUandME https://t.co/fu1EcsaZgl

The future belongs to European youth 🇪🇺
Our new #DiscoverEU initiative will give 1.5 million young people opportunities to explore Europe's cultural heritage and diversity. 
https://t.co/PGV0HIDJt2 #EUBudget #EUandME https://t.co/wfQvtGZbTW

We want young Europeans to benefit from an #ErasmusPlus programme that is more:
 ✅ Inclusive
 ✅ Accessible
 ✅ Broader and forward-looking
 ✅ International
https://t.co/DEd0Q3FX2a #EUBudget #EUandME https://t.co/HhyQACzsRm

We want to revise the European Globalisation Adjustment Fund to support more effectively workers who have lost their jobs. Other reasons for restructuring, such as automation or digitalisation will be eligible for support → https://t.co/IGNRtZDLlY #EUandME #EUBudget https://t.co/umAY5C5iHj

One of the main goals of the next #EUbudget is to empower people. 
With €101 Billion for the period 2021–2027, we want to strengthen Europe's social dimension and to make the European Pillar of #SocialRights a reality. 
Learn more → https://t.co/IGNRtZDLlY #EUandME https://t.co/1f3SX9e44d

“We are proposing to double our funding for #ErasmusPlus, reinforce the EU's #CreativeEurope programme and make the European Pillar of #SocialRights a reality on the ground” @VDombrovskis  @mariannethyssen @GabrielMariya @TNavracsicsEU #EUandME #EUBudget https://t.co/5zc5hsV33v

Today is about #EUandME
From 13:00 CET, we will be live with Vice President @VDombrovskis and Commissioners @mariannethyssen, @GabrielMariya and @TNavracsicsEU for the presentation of our #EUBudget proposals on investing in people. https://t.co/5RelfKdXJP

Are you interested in European Citizens’ Initiatives? Now it’s easier to keep up on the latest news with our new Forum. Take a look 👉 https://t.co/rwD1cGCoah  #EUTakeTheInitiative https://t.co/BxyiJMvMvp

data.text:
Une Europe qui protège, une Europe qui donne les moyens d'agir, une Europe qui défend
Débat sur l'avenir de l'Europe @Xavier_Bettel et @JunckerEU 🇱🇺 🇪🇺
#FutureofEurope https://t.co/WzIz2cKdqn

Europe is their playground, where they find inspiration. 
We support artists and creators with our #CreativeEurope programme. We want our long term #EUBudget to continue promoting European culture and values. https://t.co/llLgojXL6J

We want to double the size of Erasmus Plus and launch a new Creative Europe and a new Justice, Rights and Value programme
Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on #SocialRights, #ErasmusPlus and #EuropeforCulture. Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/IthbHhNLbF

data.text:
President @JunckerEU convinced that #Italy's fate does not lie in the hands of the financial markets:
“Italy is a founding member of the EU that has and will continue on its European path. Italy deserves respect.”
https://t.co/fSFVE7yPUb

Our #CohesionPolicy is one of the most concrete expressions of EU solidarity. 
For more information
→ Read our Press Release https://t.co/URRCKRT5uL
→ Read our Questions & Answers https://t.co/y6GQMCugtb
→ See our Factsheets https://t.co/oWQlGq27WS
→ Follow @EU_Regional https://t.co/siFoAcT1Iy

domain.name: Politician

data.text: .@MargSchinas clarifies position of the @JunckerEU @EU_Commission on #Italy: "It is the Italians and only the Italians who will decide on the future of their country." https://t.co/3uLNvacjoa

We propose to make the #CohesionPolicy rules less complex in the long-term #EUbudget, with less red tape, lighter control procedures, right level of flexibility and one set of rules for the 7 EU funds. https://t.co/URRCKRT5uL https://t.co/6V8paYMc81

In our long-term #EUBudget, we want a #CohesionPolicy which leaves no one behind. We propose to make it tailored-made, for all regions and locally-led. 
Learn more → https://t.co/URRCKRT5uL https://t.co/x2AwQMlZAY

We propose to modernise #CohesionPolicy by focusing on five investment priorities:
💡 Smarter Europe
🌿 Greener Europe
📡 Connected Europe 
🏩 Social Europe
👫 Europe closer to citizens
Learn more → https://t.co/URRCKRT5uL https://t.co/bsx8Z444aU

Over the next decade, #CohesionPolicy will help all regions modernise their industry and invest in innovation and the transition to a low-carbon, circular economy.
@CorinaCretuEU @jyrkikatainen #EUbudget #FutureofEurope https://t.co/31OqZxvOnb

Flexibility, accountability, territorial cooperation... 
From 15:30 CET, we will be live with vice-President @jyrkikatainen and Commissioner @CorinaCretuEU for the presentation of our #EUBudget proposals on #CohesionPolicy https://t.co/OidmniqlXm

Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on regional development and #CohesionPolicy.
Innovation, small businesses, skills, jobs, social inclusion: what #FutureofEurope do we want? Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/prP7Eg1hpK

We welcome @EUCouncil adoption of directive boosting transparency for tax intermediaries, requiring them to report potentially aggressive tax planning schemes.
Another win in the crackdown on corporate tax avoidance. #FairTaxation https://t.co/ELqJ8F9wce

Any justice reform must uphold the #RuleofLaw in line with European standards on judicial independence.
The #EUJusticeScoreboard encourages and helps Member States better identify the challenges and address them with good justice reforms → https://t.co/OWvGYLOgkR https://t.co/2NGVzS9yTk

Save the date!
This week, we will start rolling out our sectoral #EUBudget proposals: 
🖇️ Tuesday #CohesionPolicy 
👫 Wednesday #EUandME
💶 Thursday #DeepeningEMU
🌱 Friday #FutureofCAP and #LIFE https://t.co/gbahajrHZc

We propose an adjustment to intellectual property rules to remove a legal barrier preventing EU pharmaceutical companies from competing on equal terms on global markets.
 https://t.co/xSTJ3w13ct #IPR https://t.co/KOCzrfusg2

Reducing harmful plastic litter is an opportunity for European businesses.
We can create sustainable products that the world will demand for decades to come, and extract more economic value from our precious resources.
#PlasticsStrategy #PassOnPlastic https://t.co/19mCvxlJOq

500,000 tonnes of EU plastic waste end up in the sea every year.
Building on our #PlasticsStrategy, we're tackling 10 single-use plastic products and fishing gear that account for 70% of the marine litter in Europe.
We can only solve this urgent issue together. #CircularEconomy https://t.co/TRKwHr6zjg

Plastic waste is choking our oceans, killing wildlife and threatening our own health.
We're targeting the 10 most found plastic waste items on Europe's beaches as well fishing gear.
https://t.co/Uyqr74Z3Vv #PlasticsStrategy #CircularEconomy https://t.co/wA3ynu1VQw

Plastic waste ends up in our air, our soil, our oceans, and in our food. Watch to learn how today's proposals will help us move towards sustainable alternatives to single-use plastics. @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen #PlasticsStrategy https://t.co/pxRmRTVXPH

@alex41894092 Hi @alex41894092, you can also send your feedback through the dedicated form so that it will directly feed into the work of the Task Force https://t.co/4HQgIEKdG7
Best, the social media team

@hanno_roedger Thank you for your comment @hanno_roedger! Feel free to send your feedback through the dedicated form so that it will directly feed into the work of the Task Force: https://t.co/4HQgIEKdG7
Best, the social media team

@WhatNowDoc Dear @WhatNowDoc, you will find all the contacts you need at this link: https://t.co/RQahhsLlMU
Best, the social media team

@ihatehypocrytes Hi @ihatehypocrytes, by illegal content online we refer e.g. to terrorist content, illegal hate speech, child sexual abuse material, or illegal commercial practices and infringements of intellectual property rights.
More in our recent recommendation: https://t.co/HzPKooOM6B
@quvy @A_WintersteinEC Here is the correct link: https://t.co/IcpMaNDl5j

What is the role of national and regional authorities in making a more #EfficientEU
• Watch live at 9:30 @TimmermansEU at @EU_CoR hearing on the work of the Task Force on Subsidiarity: https://t.co/8P2YVa1BAX
• Share your feedback on the Task Force → https://t.co/PYhJDn4iJB https://t.co/SwmwxfzkXT
📌 Check out the #TeamJunckerEU calendar for the week including #EUdialogues → https://t.co/yybXsoU7ye

We recently presented our EU #PlasticsStrategy with great ambitions in mind: ensuring that all plastics packaging placed on EU market are recyclable by 2030. 
Tomorrow, we will take it one step further with our proposal on single-use plastics. Stay tuned... https://t.co/oWRr5JasTM

The future of the world depends on the good cooperation between Europe and Africa. 
This week we launched programmes worth €400 million, including support for African youth – all the more important as 60% of Africa's population is under 25 years old. #AUEU https://t.co/UgjaBqEVEm

Europe is open for business. 
We are now set to begin #EUtrade negotiations with Australia and New Zealand. 
We look forward to adding these two countries to the EU's ever-growing circle of close trading partners → https://t.co/iPMDk4AEUm https://t.co/h6D6XwqjO3

Now farmers can tap into satellite data to monitor crop changes and increase production in a more environmentally friendly way. This EU-funded project in Poland made it possible https://t.co/K3fIkbdOtr #investEU https://t.co/syX21YGLMt

Wondering why your inbox is full of privacy-related emails from companies you know?
It's because of the new pan European #dataprotection rules! https://t.co/iw9KualdDN #EUandME #GDPR https://t.co/gPaMKHCgL5
@alexphoenixwing Here is the correct link: https://t.co/IcpMaNDl5j

Nicola went from unemployed to entrepreneur thanks to the Loan of Honour, an EU-funded project in Italy combining small loans with free training and technical assistance https://t.co/pSgDSWLXum #investEU https://t.co/EhrHEyApc1

Our EU #DataProtection rules entered into application, putting the Europeans back in control of their data. 
Europe is asserting its digital sovereignty and gets ready for the digital age. Learn more → https://t.co/eUYVho41OG #GDPR https://t.co/sGP8cqR8QG

We are assessing the experience of online users in order to effectively fight the spread of illegal content online. Share your experience via our questionnaire in all EU languages → https://t.co/YXllxxLjod #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/wa9Y4maVO4

We need around €180 billion a year of additional investments in energy efficiency and renewable energy to achieve the EU's 2030 climate targets. 
Mobilising private capital to fund sustainable investment is essential.
Learn about our proposals → https://t.co/gagnqfnnmK https://t.co/A5QLbQfoYR

We are supporting 79 innovative projects with €146 million to bring innovations faster onto the market.
Projects include: a novel anti-lock braking system for e-bikes, technology to quickly contain oil spills, a detection tool for Alzheimer’s.
https://t.co/n0JZNpDKRU #HorizonEU https://t.co/uB1YTJRQpG

We are working towards a #EuropeanEducationArea by 2025.
This week, we presented initiatives on 
💳 European Student Cards
🏫 European Universities
🎓 Master's modules in creativity
🎭 Artists' mobility
📽 EU film week
Learn more → https://t.co/bDVAG4aJFi #EUandMe https://t.co/o2i1CnBd9h

We want better insurance for victims of motor accidents, improved rights for policy holders, and a reinforced fight against uninsured driving → https://t.co/dJN4UHyCaS #MyMoneyEU https://t.co/GiOfsu9skJ

Personal data is the gold of the 21st century. 
We leave our data basically at every step we take, especially in the digital world. The new #DataProtection rules will put the Europeans back in control of their data. #GDPR https://t.co/qT8guSdyq2

European Year of Cultural Heritage: 
29 projects to receive €5 million after the call for proposals.
Learn more about these innovative transnational projects that will showcase cultural heritage → https://t.co/7XCn3v1ZM4
#EuropeforCulture #investEU https://t.co/zPRNS4E5bs
